questions.question: Which of the following actions helps maintain the confidentiality of EHRs?
options: Sharing patient information on social media to increase awareness
Keeping passwords confidential and logging out of the system when not in use
Sharing patient data with anyone who asks
Printing patient records for personal use

questions.question: Why is it essential to always log out of the EHR system when you're finished with your work?
options: To prevent unauthorized access to patient information if someone else uses the computer
To allow the system to automatically update patient records
To speed up the system for other users
To ensure your password remains valid for the next session
